name: 3D Bowling Simulator FREE
description:
Finally the One and Only Bowling Game that isn't just another arcade game but a real simulation with 3D characters!

* Very easy to play

* Play a 3D character and beautifully animated! Choose among 3 girls, 3 guys and even zombies, mummies, Santa, a Troll and more!


* Perfect immersion. Grab the bowling ball, walk to the bowling alley, aim for the pins and... Strike!.. or not... It's up tp you to sharpen your skills...


Follow us on Twitter or facebook to know about the newest releases & more!
